channel.title: Posts on My Key Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My Key Notes

item.title: Markdown Guide
item.description: What is Markdown? Markdown is a lightweight markup language that you can use to format plain text documents. Write docs for your GitHub projects, edit your GitHub profile README etc. You fill find it all here. Let’s dive into it. ⤵️ Table of Contents Paragraph Headings Emphasis Blockquote Images Links Code Lists Ordered List Unordered List Mixed List Table Task List Footnote Jump to section Horizontal Line HTML Paragraph By writing regular text you are basically writing a paragraph.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
